general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic programs, schools within the university (Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research), and key administrative and student support services. It includes information on examinations, academic credits, curriculum feedback, university resources, leadership, history, legal frameworks, health and counseling services, skill enhancement initiatives (language, soft skills, technology, entrepreneurship), media, student guidelines (visa, insurance), mentoring, recruitment, international campuses, ethics courses, and cyber crime reporting.
